adrFormatAddress: 296 Elizabeth St #3f, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Dhrymes has been a fabulous psychiatrist to collaborate with!  As a therapist, I've sent many patients to him (and continue to) for medication management.  He has been the most communicative, open-minded, and thoughtful psychiatrist I've collaborated with in private practice. It is evident to both myself and my patients that he cares about each person he works with, thinks deeply about each case, and develops a treatment plan that fits the unique needs of each individual he works with.  All of our mutual patients come back to me reporting they are so happy to be working with him!

originalText.text: Thoughtful, thorough, knowledgeable..I cannot say enough wonderful things about Dr. Dhrymes. He is a rare gem in the world of psychiatry and all medical care.

text.text: Thoughtful, thorough, knowledgeable..I cannot say enough wonderful things about Dr. Dhrymes. He is a rare gem in the world of psychiatry and all medical care.

originalText.text:
Jim is a fantastic doctor. He is a great listener who personalizes treatment based on the individual rather than using a blanket solution that may or may not work. In this vein, he is extremely knowledgeable, which allows him to come to helpful conclusions that other doctors would have had trouble coming to. He is empathetic and it is clear he genuinely cares about his patients.

He is also both responsive and prompt. He always answers emails in less than 24 hours (a large majority of the time, much quicker). He calls prescriptions in immediately and overall makes logistics as painless as possible. If you are looking for a psychiatrist, I highly recommend him.

In this vein, he is extremely knowledgeable, which allows him to come to helpful conclusions that other doctors would have had trouble coming to. He is also both responsive and prompt. He always answers emails in less than 24 hours (a large majority of the time, much quicker). He calls prescriptions in immediately and overall makes logistics as painless as possible. If you are looking for a psychiatrist, I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: Dr. Dhrymes is an outstanding psychiatrist with expertise in mood disorders, anxiety disorders, PTSD, ADHD, personalty disorders, and addiction. We have worked collaboratively and I've seen that his assessments include symptoms as well as psychodynamic analyses, and that recommendations include not only medications, but other forms of treatment as well including psychotherapy. He is a great colleague and highly regarded by peers.

originalText.text: A week ago he said as soon as he gets paid, he will refill my meds and today he’s like no I don’t keep my promises so now I’m gonna run out of medication
